name: Scarlet O Sangria

ingredients.name: apple juice, cranberry or grape juice
Scarlet O Tea leaves
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or tea leaves of your choice

ingredients.name: peeled and sliced fresh fruit (berries, oranges, kiwi, pears or apples)
apple juice, cranberry or grape juice
red wine, white wine, or sparkling wine

preparation: Freeze first 2 cups of juice in an Iceberg Mold.
Simmer tea leaves and water in a Multipurpose pot over medium heat for 7 minutes. Strain into a pitcher and allow to cool before refrigerating.
Before serving, add fruit juice ice cubes, fruit, and juice to pitcher. Serve in chilled glasses.
